- **Efficiency Tip of the Day ** (2 min) – Julie
  - [Boomerang for email](https://www.boomeranggmail.com/) - this let’s you pause your inbox and holds mail until you unpause or at a certain time, it returns (boomerangs email) back to your inbox if it doesn’t receive a response or at some designated date, sends email later to respect others inboxes and work times.
